name: SFAS - Little Devourers
description:
A small arcade style game where you have to eat more little red blocks than your opponents, collecting power ups to help you out or hinder your. Try to be the last one standing.

Controls:

UP/LEFT/DOWN/RIGHT - W/A/S/D

SHIFT - SPRINT

Sound used:

Water sound - Yosarrian https://www.freesound.org/people/yosarrian/sounds/...

Music - Thomas Allen https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YeyQzqEFsyM
